subject: refactor: complete removal of Combined/Shareholder perspective references
body:
Code changes:
- Remove 'combined' perspective fallbacks in perspective-toggle.js
- Remove combined projection generation in growth-projections.js
- Remove consolidation rendering in compliance-analyzer.js
- Remove consolidation fields from all 6 model files
- Remove unused 'combined' parameter from tax position calculation
- Update keyboard shortcuts display (removed 'C' key)

Documentation updates:
- Update README.md to show two-perspective analysis
- Update BUSINESS_GUIDE.md to remove shareholder view references
- Update MANUAL_TESTING_GUIDE.md to remove shareholder testing
- Remove Shareholder Perspective sections from all model concept docs
- Update registry.js and results-display.js comments
- Delete completed REFACTOR_PLAN_REMOVE_COMBINED.md

Terminology updates:
- 'three perspectives' → 'two perspectives'
- 'Net Effect' references removed
- 'combined asset maximisation' → clearer client-focused language
